comments.body: are those constants or static properties (of type `number`)? The source uses those as props, but the intent could be to treat those as constants (you could mark those as readonly if that would help using as const values)

These are static members in the class.
'readonly' is for instance fields.
So I can't change them to 'readonly'.
I don't know any other way to make them constant than to use literal types.
Please accept this suggestion, I've created separate PR to remove Alex from code owners (as requested in a comment)
